item.title: [Galkon's Refactored]Adding 100% New Tabs
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:14, topic:300939”]here is the same code but made it a little easyier to look at.[code] public boolean clickedInArea(int x, int x2, int y, int y2) {
if(super.mouseX >= x && super.mouseX <= x2 && super.mouseY >= y && super.mouseY < y2) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}

	public boolean clickdNTArea(int x, int x2, int loc) {	
		if(loc == 0 && clickedInArea(x,x2,168,205)){//top tabs
			return true;
		} else if(loc == 1 && clickedInArea(x,x2,466,503)) {
			return true;
		} else {
	return false;
	}
}
public boolean saveClickedInArea(int x, int x2, int y, int y2, int ID) {
		if(super.saveClickX >= x && super.saveClickX <= x2 && super.saveClickY >= y && super.saveClickY < y2 && tabInterfaceIDs[ID] != -1)
		{
		return true;
		} else {
		return false;
		}
}

private void processTabClick() {
if(clickdNTArea(521, 550, 0)) {
tabHPos = 0;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(552, 581, 0)) {
tabHPos = 1;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(582, 611, 0)) {
tabHPos = 2;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(612, 641, 0)) {
tabHPos = 3;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(642, 671, 0)) {
tabHPos = 4;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(672, 701, 0)) {
tabHPos = 5;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(702, 731, 0)) {
tabHPos = 6;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(732, 761, 0)) {
tabHPos = 7;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(522, 551, 1)) {
tabHPos = 15;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(552, 581, 1)) {
tabHPos = 8;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(582, 611, 1)) {
tabHPos = 9;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(612, 641, 1)) {
tabHPos = 10;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(642, 671, 1)) {
tabHPos = 11;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(672, 701, 1)) {
tabHPos = 12;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(702, 731, 1)) {
tabHPos = 13;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else if(clickdNTArea(732, 761, 1)) {
tabHPos = 14;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
} else {
tabHPos = -1;
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(super.clickMode3 == 1) {
if(saveClickedInArea(522, 551, 169, 205, 0))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 0;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(552, 581, 168, 205, 1))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 1;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(582, 611, 168, 205, 2))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 2;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(612, 641, 168, 203, 14))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 14;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(642, 671, 168, 205, 3))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 3;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(672, 701, 168, 205, 4))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 4;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(702, 731, 169, 205, 5))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 5;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(732, 761, 169, 205, 6))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 6;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(522, 551, 466, 503, 16))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 16;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(552, 581, 466, 503, 8))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 8;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(582, 611, 466, 503, 9))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 9;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(612, 641, 466, 503, 7))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 7;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(642, 671, 466, 503, 11))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 11;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(672, 701, 466, 503, 12))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 12;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(702, 731, 466, 502, 13))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 13;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
if(saveClickedInArea(732, 761, 466, 502, 15))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 15;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
/* Logout X */
if(saveClickedInArea(742, 764, 1, 24, 10))
{
needDrawTabArea = true;
tabID = 10;
tabAreaAltered = true;
}
}
}[/code] i am trying to lessen the code so that it is only a couple of lines. the area method can be used in other parts of the client class as well. thx galkon for the tut. they help alot.[/quote]i shortened it even more add public int[][] tabAreas = {{0, 521, 550, 0}, {1, 552, 581, 0}, {2, 582, 611, 0}, {3, 612, 641, 0}, {4, 642, 671, 0}, {5, 672, 701, 0}, {6, 702, 731, 0}, {7, 732, 761, 0}, {8, 552, 581, 1}, {9, 582, 611, 1}, {10, 612, 641, 1}, {11, 642, 671, 1}, {12, 672, 701, 1}, {13, 702, 731, 1}, {14, 732, 761, 1}, {15, 522, 551, 1}}; then replace if(clickdNTArea(521, 550, 0)) { tabHPos = 0; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(552, 581, 0)) { tabHPos = 1; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(582, 611, 0)) { tabHPos = 2; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(612, 641, 0)) { tabHPos = 3; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(642, 671, 0)) { tabHPos = 4; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(672, 701, 0)) { tabHPos = 5; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(702, 731, 0)) { tabHPos = 6; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(732, 761, 0)) { tabHPos = 7; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(522, 551, 1)) { tabHPos = 15; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(552, 581, 1)) { tabHPos = 8; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(582, 611, 1)) { tabHPos = 9; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(612, 641, 1)) { tabHPos = 10; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(642, 671, 1)) { tabHPos = 11; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(672, 701, 1)) { tabHPos = 12; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(702, 731, 1)) { tabHPos = 13; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else if(clickdNTArea(732, 761, 1)) { tabHPos = 14; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } else { tabHPos = -1; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } with this for(int[] a: tabAreas){ if(clickdNTArea(a[1], a[2], a[3])) { tabHPos = a[0]; needDrawTabArea = true; tabAreaAltered = true; } } i tested and works flawless as far as i can see.

Read full topic

return true;
} else {
return false;
}

	public boolean clickdNTArea(int x, int x2, int loc) {

			return true;
		} else if(loc == 1 && clickedInArea(x,x2,466,503)) {

		} else {
	return false;

}
public boolean saveClickedInArea(int x, int x2, int y, int y2, int ID) {
		if(super.saveClickX >= x && super.saveClickX <= x2 && super.saveClickY >= y && super.saveClickY < y2 && tabInterfaceIDs[ID] != -1)

		return true;
